Headline: #18 16th-18th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Roosevelt/Michigan
ShortDescription: EB 18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, State, 11th, Wabash & Roosevelt, due to street blockage near Roosevelt/Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, State, 11th, Wabash & Roosevelt, due to street blockage near Roosevelt/Michigan.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks near O'Hare. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks near O'Hare.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
